subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Question for all "Frank's ghostbox" owners

full_text:

Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

Some older voices using the tone. To me, I thought they were easier to 
understand.

Now instead of "Purple -We Raised You Catholic"  I hear it as "We use the 
boxes Purple", just a change in percption, I guess.

I tried to set the tone level so it wan't too obnoxious.

I only had the two voices saved on the PC, the main session is on some CD 
stored in the "pile".

Frank
